channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NV
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NV

item.title: Report X-2024030337
item.description:
Report X-2024030337

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-14T18:15:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-05
  • City: HENDERSON
  • State: NV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package handler noticed leaking hazmat package and notified van line manager. DescribePack: Puncture at the bottom corner of plastic bottle. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Manager notified QA. QA placed damaged hazmat in a plastic lined hazmat tote while wearing latex gloves.

item.title: Report X-2024030159
item.description:
Report X-2024030159

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-12T15:28:43+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-27
  • City: SPARKS
  • State: NV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: This package was on the way down the IC belt when the pail got stuck on part of the belt and fell off. DescribePack: One side of the metal pail is bent in causing the liquid to leak out. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Spill tote and spill pads.
